name: Ani-rolls
description:
You are a new ranger in this forest that is in danger. Try to save animals' lives as many as you can! 

Control:

A/D or arrow key to move left and right

w/Up Arrow/Space to jump

Left-click for animal abilities:

Owl: drag to fly to the mouse position

Hummingbird: click to dash to the mouse position and pin, click again to unpin

Hint:

Change direction while jumping up

Credits:

Flavedo: Programmer/Designer

Sourlyx-composer: sound designer

Dawn (Coat): Artist
